ratingGuide.guidance: Environmental stewardship is world-class: our family enjoys pristine air and water, more than 40% of land protected, biodiversity intact, urban parks within a short walk, and strict enforcement keeps noise and light pollution minimal.
Nature is excellent with only minor localized industrial impacts; we have easy access to clean waterways and forests, and food standards tightly monitor pesticides.
High environmental quality overall, though some suburbs show moderate traffic emissions or agricultural runoff; weekend nature trips remain straightforward.
